Charlotte Mensah bụ onye Britain / Ghanaian hairstylist

Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye nduzi okike nke Hair Lounge, na Portobello Road nke London.  N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị isi ojii mbụ a kpọbatara n’ụlọ ezumezu nke British Hairdressing Hall of Fame.
A mụrụ Mensah na United Kingdom
Ọ gara London College of Fashion
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nrite ndị ọ nwetara maka ọrụ ya gụnyere:
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Charlotte Mensah Academy, site na nke ọ na-ahazi nkuzi iji zụọ ndị na-eto eto, ndị na-enweghị isi na Ghana nkà ya..
O guzobekwara Ladies of Visionary Empowerment nke na-ezube ịkwalite ohere agụmakwụkwọ na inye ụmụ agbọghọ ike n'Africa.
